metadata.description: A comprehensive collection of Claude Code plugins following the skills approach for enhanced development workflows, context engineering, git management, and documentation. All plugins now bundle skills that are automatically available when the plugin is installed.

plugins.name: context-engineering
plugins.description: Advanced context engineering workflow with PRP generation, execution orchestration, and GitHub issue analysis

plugins.name: development-workflow
plugins.description: Comprehensive development toolkit with senior engineering, code review, architecture advisory, and PR management capabilities

plugins.name: git-project-management
plugins.description: Git worktree management and project planning utilities for efficient version control workflows

plugins.name: documentation-templates
plugins.description: Templates and examples for creating comprehensive project documentation including AGENTS.md and Claude Code delegation rules
